txt.en: 'The encampment of Lang Rhuven is heavily guarded. Perhaps you and your allies would be able to curb their vigilance by defeating some of the men who perch on the guard towers scattered throughout the camp. May your arrows hit their target, my friend!'
Defeated many Khundolar tower-guards at Lang Rhuven.
Cand√∫r has been monitoring the Enemy in Lang Rhuven and believes that now is the time to attack the camp.
Tower-guards can be found in Lang Rhuven on the border of Dagorlad.\n\nYou should defeat tower-guards found in Lang Rhuven.
You have defeated many of the tower-guards within the enemy encampment of Lang Rhuven. With their guard towers unmanned, you should be able to strike your foes again with ease.
